name: Super Ninja Bros
description:
Super Ninja Bros is a 2D platformer made with Unity. 🎲

It was a student group project made in two weeks for an exposition related with the 80's at Montpellier. 🕹️
We had to copy a game from this decade and to custom it, the point was to use the Unity Inspector to show how games are made to people who don't know. 👨‍💻

And this is for those reasons that i chose Super Mario Bros NES, because modifying the speed/jump values for the player or the enemies would be very interesting and fun for the exposition !  🎉
